hero.title: Sustainable Fisheries for Liberia's Future
hero.subtitle: Managing marine resources, supporting communities, and promoting responsible fishing practices across Liberia

welcome.title: Welcome to NaFAA
welcome.subtitle: Leading Sustainable Fisheries Management in Liberia
welcome.description: The National Fisheries and Aquaculture Authority (NaFAA) is committed to the sustainable management and development of Liberia's fisheries resources. We work to balance economic growth with environmental conservation, supporting coastal communities while protecting marine ecosystems.
